Compute Summary Statistic for Numeric Columns

Source: R/summarize_numeric.R
summarize_numeric.Rd

Compute Summary Statistic for Numeric Columns

Usage

summarize_numeric(data)

Arguments

data

A data frame with description with numeric columns to be summarized (assumed to have no NAs)

Value

A data frame in wide format with summary stats.

Examples

# data <- data.frame(a = c(1,2,3), b = c(4,5,6))
# summarize_numeric(data)
# Create sample data
sample_data <- data.frame(
  search_trends_anxiety = c(10, 12, 15),
  new_confirmed = c(100, 120, 130),
  non_numeric = c("a", "b", "c")
)

# Summarize numeric columns
summary_stats <- summarize_numeric(sample_data)
print(summary_stats)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 7
#>   Variable                Min   Q25  Mean Median   Q75   Max
#>   <chr>                 <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 search_trends_anxiety    10    11  12.3     12  13.5    15
#> 2 new_confirmed           100   110 117.     120 125     130
